name: Mike Pender's Searchers
description: '''Mike Pender's Searchers''' contains lead singer and guitarist [[Mike Pender]], formerly of [[The Searchers (band)|The Searchers]]. Pender left The Searchers in December 1985 hoping to explore new musical directions while preserving the classic 12-string guitar style that he helped to popularise. Mike Pender's Searchers showcase the classic hits from Pender's many years with The Searchers in addition to his all-new material and a blend of popular rock standards by classic artists such as [[Buddy Holly]], [[The Drifters]] and [[Roy Orbison]].
